snippet.title: The Epyx Collection: Handheld - PC / Xbox Series X|S Gameplay
snippet.description:
[NOTE: The footage is based on the Windows 10/11 version, as it is a "Play Anywhere" title that can also be played on Xbox Series X|S.]

Witness the return of seven awesome Epyx classics from the 1980s/90s, originally designed for the Atari Lynx.

While the games can be purchased separately on Steam, this compilation comes with rewind, Xbox achievements, cloud saves and manuals.

00:00 - Intro
02:00 - Blue Lightning
07:00 - California Games
18:10 - Chip's Challenge
21:18 - Electrocop
25:20 - Gates of Zendocon
32:31 - Todd's Adventures in Slime World
38:10 - Zarlor Mercenary

The Epyx Collection: Handheld (C) Imagine Software / Pixel Games UK / Epyx Games, LLC.
Developed by Pixel Games UK
Published by Imagine Software
Also released on Nintendo Switch
